HOW A 7 YR OLD EXPLAINS SEX!!!

HOW A 7 YR OLD EXPLAINS SEX!!! LMAO

Little Johnny was 7 years old and like other boys his age rather
curious.

He had been hearing quite a bit
about 'making out'
from the older boys, and he wondered
what it was
and how it was done.

One day he took his question to his
mother, who
became rather flustered. Instead of
explainingthings to Johnny, she told him to hide
behind the
curtains one night and watch his older
sister and
her boyfriend.

This he did. The following morning,
Johnny
described EVERYTHING to his mother.

"Sis and her boyfriend sat and talked for
a while, then he turned off most of the lights.

Then he started kissing and hugging her.
I figured 'Sis must be getting sick, because her
face started looking funny.

He must have thought so too, because he put his
hand inside her blouse to feel her heart,
just the way the doctor would. Except he's not as
smart as the doctor because he seemed to have
trouble finding her heart.

I guess he was getting sick too,
because pretty soon both of them started
panting and getting all out of breath.

His other hand must have been cold
because he put it under her skirt.

About this time 'Sis got worse and began
to moan and sigh and squirm around and slide
down toward the end of the couch.

This was when her fever started.
I knew it was a fever, because Sis
told him she felt really hot.

Finally, I found out what was making them so
sick......-a big eel ;had gotten inside his pants
somehow. It just jumped out of his pants and
stood there, about 10 inches long, honest, anyway
he grabbed it in one hand to keep it from getting
away.

When Sis saw it, she got really scared-her eyes
got big, and her mouth fell open, and
she started calling out to God and stuff like that.
She said it was the biggest one she's ever seen;
I should tell her about the ones down at the lake by
our house!

Anyway, Sis got brave and tried to kill the eel by
biting its head off.The eel spit on her face
a little bit and then, All of a sudden she grabbed it
with both hands and held it tight while he
took a muzzle out of his pocket and slipped it
over the eel's head to keep it from biting again.

Sis lay back and spread her legs so she
could get a scissor-lock on it and he helped by lying
on top of the eel. The eel put up a hell of a fight.

Sis started groaning and squealing and her
boyfriend almost upset the couch. I guess
they wanted to kill the eel by squashing it
between them.

After a while they both quit moving and gave a
great sigh. Her boyfriend got up, and sure enough,
they killed the eel. I knew because it just
hung there, limp, and some of its insides were
hanging out.

Sis and her boyfriend were a little tired from the
battle, but they went back to courting anyway.
He started hugging and kissing her again. By
golly, the eel wasn't dead! It jumped straight up
and started to fight again.

I guess eels are like cats- they have nine lives or
something. This time, Sis jumped up and
tried to kill it by sitting on it. After about a 35
minute struggle, they finally killed the eel.
I knew it was dead, because I saw Sis's boyfriend peel
its skin off and flush it down the toilet.

THANKS!

the one I desire

Its the people like you
That make me understand
The man who wants more
When all is placed out for him
Or the one that wants no-more
Once all bases are reached
The one you trust
Just to watch them rip it
at the seams

The father that says the will be there
But never is
Or the mother that will make a promise
Just to watch it break

The close friend that you would
take a bullet for
But they would never do the same
for you

The best friend you would
offer the world to
Just to watch them waste it
The neighbour that will talk
only when in need of something
The mate that will sit by your side
Just to laugh when your back is turned
The new girl that is beautiful
But is trapped by unfaithfull words
The friend you hardly know
I am in love just by thier smile

The saviour in your eyes
That cares nothing about you

The people you could die for
And theyd do the same for you
You think its out of love
But its only because they felt
that had to
The one you are in love with
But will never say it back
The hate printed on paper
Only their to make you remember
The man that will make you loose everything
Will be the one I desire

fkn men.

Seriously, why the fuck are all guys the same.
Even the most beautiful person, the one that has no flaws
Just sits their knowing your heart will shatter
but wont give a shit until its too late.
I hate people like you
You, the ones who think a girl has to be perfect
The one that thinks age is the biggest deal in the world
The one who says no, but still lets you do it.
Those fucking assholes, everyone has had one.
I cant hate you, I love you.
But nothing I do will or could do, will be good enough
for your stupid standards.
Nothing I FUCKING DO will make you see
Not every girl wears their armor and beauty on the outside
Not every fucking girl likes it to be ripped apart at the seams
I know I was the one who fucked it up, but baby, you inniciated it.
You inniciated it from the word go, even tho it was ME who was unsure
You took it too far, and now im left here, like this, a wreck.
I hate you, I hate every guy
your all the fucking same, you wont know what you have until you never get it offered again
Your fucking pathetic, low life arrogant fucks, seriously.
One thing is important to you, and when the oppurtunity arises for it
This armor is not going to hold for the life of me.

I love you too much

Make me hate you, please

i'm tired =[

I'm tired of the male population

I'm tired of putting on makeup to appear half decent for strangers

I'm tired of school & all the people in it

I'm tired of boring television shows

I'm tired of not being able to solve my own problems

I'm tired of not being able to hand in things on time

I'm tired of immature people

I'm tired of liars & the pathetic excuses that they come up with

I'm tired of being upset over stupid people

I'm tired of fighting with family members

I'm tired of people on the internet acting tough

I'm tired of date service advertisments

I'm tired of not being able to find something I want

I'm tired of worrying about the little things in life

I'm tired of the 'scene kids' that hang around Flinders Station

I'm tired of pulling apart my wardrobe in hope to find something half decent to wear

I'm tired of electrical appliances breaking

I'm tired of paying for phone credit

I'm tired of having nothing to do on the weekend

I'm tired of getting my nails done & walking out of the salon dissatisfied

I'm tired of thinking about exams & my enter score.

I'm tired of making the wrong decision

I'm tired of my mum's advice. It usually hurts, but its always right

I'm tired of saying "now would you like that meal or be regular or large today?"

I'm tired of friends that waste my time

I'm tired of waiting for a reply

I'm tired of hearing people say "oh my god..don't make it obvious, but check out that chicks ...........!"

I'm tired of drifting from friends you had once considered to be close to

I'm tired of removing cat fur from my school bag every morning

I'm tired of realising that I've wasted so much money on nothing

I'm tired of nagging parents

I'm tired of refreshing my myspace

I'm tired of doing my regular Saturday morning house chores

I'm tired of not being able to decide what purfume to wear every morning

I'm tired of trying to impress people when I really just shouldnt bother

I'm tired of gorgeous people constantly denying their beauty

I'm tired of overweight people not covering up parts of their body that only skinny people can pull off showing

I'm tired of always being tired *sigh*

HELP!!!!

ok i need advise ppl..... theres this guy i like and it started out just been a fuck buddy thing then he asked me out, that night we screwed and it was awsome not only the sex but just hangin out together, but then i didn't hear from in like 3 weeks! i tried callin and every thing.... but couldn't get through so i gave up! then he'd call and i'd forgive him and we'd screw and then i wouldn't hear from him in like another 3 weeks.... this happed like 3 times..

last night he rocks up on my door step begging for forgiveness and shit what should i do? just not screw him and see if he hangs around? or just fuck him off for good?

Much luv!

thanks pp who gave me advise on the whole "fuck buddy relationship thing" i told him what i wanted and he finely told me that he did just want sex which was one of the probs to begin with.... that he didn't have th balls to tell me that, even tho i asked him a number of times! so yeah i fucked him off!!!! ne who i've realized that i do deserve better and that i did put up with it for to long and should have done something earlier about it....

THANKS
